abstract: A roundup of opinions about whether further expansion of the Federal Reserve’s balance sheet will do much to affect the broader economy.
snippet: A roundup of opinions about whether further expansion of the Federal Reserve’s balance sheet will do much to affect the broader economy.
lead_paragraph: 2:26 p.m. | Updated  The Federal Reserve announced today that it would buy an additional $600 billion in long-term Treasury securities by the end of June 2011.

headline.main: Will Additional Fed Action Help the Economy?
